channel.title: e-Freight SESA/Ontology - Latest News & Headlines
channel.description: The latest news and headlines from e-Freight SESA and Ontology.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2012 STI Innsbruck. All rights reserved

item.title: SESA Release - v1.1
item.description: Releasing new version of the SESA platform with a new component (service) that is able to perform lifting and lowering on an input message. This component should simplify the inter-operability between different message formats.

item.title: OntoWiki goes online
item.description: With the help of OntoWiki the e-Freight Ontology should be improved by freight domain expert in cooperation with ontology experts.

item.title: SESA First Release - v1.0
item.description: On the 20.07.2011 the first version of the Semantic Enabled Service Architecture was released. It includes a Registration, Discovery and Invocation component.
